EmailTemplate.name: May Digest 2017.Data Email send 5-3-17
EmailTemplate.subject: 5/31 Webinar: Capitalizing on Customer Desire with Social Media Analytics
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
May 3, 2017 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars]]>
Capitalizing on Customer Desire with Social Media Analytics scott hajek, PIVOTAL May 31, 2017 11:00am PDT / 2:00pm EDT
Determining customer desire or intent from social media data provides companies the opportunity to deliver targeted, more effective messaging and convert more sales. This webinar will describe the data science techniques, tools, and infrastructure to capitalize on this potentially lucrative opportunity.
Save My Seat <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/capitalizing-on-customer-desire-with-social-media-analytics?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=digest-email-link&utm_campaign=social-media-analytics-jk_q217]]>
